result.arabic_text: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
result.translation: (Umunyabyaha azabwirwa ati) “Rwose wari mu burangare (utita) kuri ibi, ariko twagukuyeho igikingirizo (cyakingirizaga umutima wawe), none uyu munsi amaso yawe yatyaye (arabona byose).”
